title: Space Invaders: Solve Basic
instructions:
Welcome to Space Invaders! Your job is to shoot down all the aliens.

You have two functions:
- `move()` moves your laser cannon one position to the right
- `shoot()` fires the laser upwards

Look at where the aliens are, then write a sequence of `move()` and `shoot()` calls to destroy them all.

Be careful:
- If you shoot when there's no alien above you, you lose!
- If you move off the right edge of the screen, you lose!
hints: Look at the screen and count how many times you need to move before each alien
You start at the far left (position 0)
Each move() takes you one position to the right
Only shoot() when you're directly below an alien
